introduction: Welcome to the Fluid Machinery Lab

UG: B.E/B.Tech in Civil Engineering and Mechanical Engineering
Diploma in Civil Engineering and Mechanical Engineering
PG: M.Tech/MS in Marine Structures and Hydraulic Engineering

objective: Many of our daily life activity depends on fluid machinery so it is important to understand the functioning principles and characteristics of such machinery from an engineering point of view. This lab focuses on giving the user idea about the practical behavior of such machines before performing operations on a real system.

courseAlignment.description: Following are the courses in which one can come across the theory connected to the experiments in this lab :
universities: Hydraulics Lab- National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal, Goa University, Anna University
Mechanics of Fluids- National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal
Fluid Mechanics I, II- APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Goa University, Anna University
Fluid Mechanics lab- APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University
